item.title: Dear programmers, developers, architects and others!
item.description: In a new year please continue writting bad programs, make bugs, create bad architecture and so on! All this destroying activity provide infinite flow of well-paid job! Thanks to those people! Let’s kludge together! [image source](http://stevenbenner.com/2010/07/the-5-types-of-programmers/" rel=“nofollow” target="_blank)
